On Using Docker to Improve Experience of Q&A Forum Users in Web Framework Development

  • StackOverflow query
  • How to run our Dockerfiles

StackOverflow query

To select our questions, we had to create a SQL Query for StackExchange Data Explorer.

The query file is available to download here.

How to run our Dockerfiles

  1. You must open a shell inside the folder of the question you want to run: docker build -t question .

  2. After that, you will build the image. The images that are not successfully built demonstrate a problem during the system environment configuration described at the question.

  3. If your image is successfully built, you can test with: docker run -p <port>:<port> question You must substitute the port parameter with the port described in the Dockerfile/application. Usually 3000, 5000 or 8000.

The Configuration questions dockerfiles are available to download here.

The General questions dockerfiles are available to download here.

The Date containing every question analyzed and our results are available to download here.
